p: A yellowish crystalline compound was isolated and identified as 5-hydroxy-4â€²,7-dimethoxy flavone ( 5) by 1H and 13C NMR experiments; the results were in perfect agreement with those reported in the literature [ 28]. Its purity was controlled by normal phase TLC with hexane/ethyl acetate 90:10 as eluting phase (Rf: 0.67).
